turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. I was looking to order three large pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One of them pineapple and ham, one with onions, olives and pepperonis, and the last meat lover's. And I'd like all of those thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 large thin crust pizzas, 1 hawaiin, 1 meatlovers, and 1 with onions, olives, and pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That'll be it for me. Thank you.
